author: VR Gorilla - Virtual Reality & 360 Videos
description:
Welcome to Crete! The largest Greek island in the Mediterranean sea. Crete has a varied landscape with high mountains, fertile plains, and long coastlines. The island was once home to the Minoan civilization, the oldest known civilization in Europe, which thrived between 2600 and 1400 BC. We explored the western part of the island and will take you along to the former capital Chania, visit some stunning lagoons, and even introduce you to a goat.

Click the *Join* button now to become a VR Gorilla YouTube member, unlocking access to the full video and our complete collection of full-length videos. https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC6AXBF-78lNa3_TjAIWZWmQ/join

For an unparalleled VR Travel viewing experience, download our "*TriptoVR*" app for your Meta Quest or mobile VR player. Find the app on the *Meta Quest* store here.

https://www.meta.com/experiences/6447684138675693/

Or on the *Pico Global* store here.

https://store-global.picoxr.com/global/detail/1/7291747813258477574
